text: Va ʙa tahqiq dar mijoni har millate pajomʙare firistodem, ki Allohro ʙiparasted va az toƣut durī çūed. Ba'zero, ki Alloh hidojat kard, ki ilman va amalan pajravi pajomʙaron ʙudand va ʙar ʙa'ze gumrohī muqarrar gaşt, ki onon pajravi rohi gumrohī ʙudand. Pas, dar zamin ʙigarded va ʙined, ki oqiʙati kori kasone, ki pajomʙaronro ʙa durūƣ nisʙat medodand, cī guna ʙudaast
